CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Completed'),OR(RecordType.DeveloperName == "Quick_Service_Order", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Free_Service_Order", RecordType.DeveloperName == "External_Service", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Warranty", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Free_Coupon", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Recall_Service", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Service_Package")),TODAY(),NULL)
CustomField.label: Order Complete Date
